sentence.value: He received an International Baccalaureate Diploma from the United World College of South East Asia in 1987, a Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering from Keio University in 1992, and a Master of Science degree in Aerospace Engineering from the University of Houston Cullen College of Engineering in 1997.

sentence.value: From 1994 to 1999, he was as an astronaut support engineer for the NASDA Astronaut Office, supporting the development of the astronaut training program and supported astronaut Koichi Wakata during Wakata's training and mission on STS-72.
sentence.annotated-sentence: From [[1994|1994]] to [[1999|1999]], he was as an [[astronaut|Astronaut]] support [[engineer|Engineer]] for the [[NASDA|National_Space_Development_Agency_of_Japan]] [[Astronaut Office|NASA_Astronaut_Corps]], supporting the development of the [[astronaut training|Astronaut_training]] program and supported [[astronaut|Astronaut]] [[Koichi Wakata|Koichi_Wakata]] during [[Wakata|6208_Wakata]]'s [[training|Astronaut_training]] and mission on [[STS-72|STS-72]].
sentence.pattern_crowdsource: From 1994 to 1999, he was as an [[astronaut|Astronaut]] support engineer for the [[NASDA|National_Space_Development_Agency_of_Japan]] Astronaut Office, supporting the development of the [[astronaut|Astronaut]] training program and supported [[astronaut|Astronaut]] [[Koichi Wakata|Koichi_Wakata]] during Wakata's training and mission on [[STS-72|STS-72]].
